@MANISH_NMA So great to hear our staff left such a positive impression. We shall definitely share your praise with our staff. Stay #RedHotSpicy 😀
@avinotabhi Hi Avi, please note that one piece of hand baggage of up to 7 kg (including laptop and duty-free) is allowed per passenger. For any excess baggage, charges are applicable.

@MANISH_NMA We are glad to hear this, Manish. We strive to provide excellent customer service and appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback. We shall certainly share your praise with our staff. Stay #RedHotSpicy 😀

You too can #win free tickets to a domestic destination of your choice. Just upload content about us on your social media feed (post/story/reel), like and follow our social media handle and tag us with the hashtag #MySpicyLife. Hurry, the #contest is on for a limited period only.
